> What part of this group description does not say that this group is
> not about the movie "Gladiator"?

The description just mentions the game Gladiator, it doesn't say anything
about having no relation to the movie of the same name.

>  Why am I asking?  I get notices from
> time to time of someone subscribing and unsubscribing the same day.
> [There is moderator setting that emails you when someone joins a
> group, leaves the group, or even uploads a file.]

Unless it is happening very often (like daily) then I wouldn't worry about
it, people do all sorts of wierd things online and stumble into places (or
in this case sign up to a mailing list) before checking that its actually
about what they want.

>  The message
> archives are public for this group so that would clear up any
> potential confusion.

Its unlikely people will look at these first before joining, though they may
look at them after joining and discover its not about what they thought :)

There's a whole pile of gladiator related groups on yahoo, perhaps you
should ammend the group's description and specifically state that this is a
PC game and not related to the movie.

I bet you'll still get people subscribing and unsubscribing the same day
though :)

- Deathifier
